task_description: **Financial Advisor (FA):** Hello! I'm your advisor, here to assist you with your financial goals.**Individual (I):** Hi! I'm interested in self_directed_investor and looking for Growth Portfolio. I consider myself aggresive in terms of risk, and I have $$500,000 to allocate.**FA:** Awesome... Any other requirement ?**I:** hmmm, yes, I am looking for something that offers research and recommendations for self-directed investors.**FA:** That aligns well with your long-term goals.
